Package com.stasroshchenko.diploma.model.service

Class VisitService

java.lang.Object
com.stasroshchenko.diploma.model.service.VisitService
@Service public class VisitService extends Object
Processes all visit business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
staffsterr2000

    • getAllDoctorVisitsAndClientUsersInMap

      public Map<Visit,​ApplicationUserClient> getAllDoctorVisitsAndClientUsersInMap​(List<Visit> source)
      Runs through source list, links visit to its client user and writes it to map (key - visit, value - client user). At the end of the day we have map of visits as keys and either client users or nulls as values.
      Parameters:
      source - source list with doctor's visits.
      Returns:
      map of visits linked to its client users.
      Since:
      1.0

    • getAllClientVisitsAndDoctorUsersInMap

      public Map<Visit,​ApplicationUserDoctor> getAllClientVisitsAndDoctorUsersInMap​(List<Visit> source)
      Runs through source list, links visit to its doctor user and puts it down to map (key - visit, value - doctor user). At the end of the day we have map of visits as keys and either doctor users or nulls as values.
      Parameters:
      source - source list with client's visits.
      Returns:
      map of visits linked to its doctor users.
      Since:
      1.0

    • passVisit

      public void passVisit​(DoctorData doctorUser, PassVisitRequest request)
      Checks income visit status's correctness (OCCURRED/NOT_OCCURRED/CANCELLED_BY_DOCTOR) and then 'passes' the visit.
      Parameters:
      doctorUser - doctor, who 'passes' the visit.
      request - pass request.
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      Visit, VisitStatus

    • isTimeFreeForDoctor

      private boolean isTimeFreeForDoctor​(DoctorData doctorUser, LocalDateTime visitDate)
      Validates that appointment time is free for doctor. Two dates must not collide for 1 hour relative to the appointment time. For example if one appointment is at 8 o'clock - next must be at least at 9 o'clock.
      Parameters:
      doctorUser - doctor, who created/accepted a visit.
      visitDate - appointment time for validation.
      Returns:
      bool, about business of the appointment time (true - time is free for this doctor).
      Since:
      1.0

    • isDateWithinWorkdayAndAtLeastTomorrow

      private boolean isDateWithinWorkdayAndAtLeastTomorrow​(LocalDateTime visitDate)
      Validates that appointment time is both within workday and at least tomorrow.
      Parameters:
      visitDate - appointment time for validation.
      Returns:
      bool, about correctness of the appointment time (true - time is valid).
      Since:
      1.0

    • isDateValidForDoctor

      private void isDateValidForDoctor​(DoctorData doctorUser, LocalDateTime visitDate)
      Validates appointment time by both validation methods and throws exception if appointment time is invalid.
      Parameters:
      doctorUser - doctor, who created/accepted a visit.
      visitDate - appointment time for validation.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if appointment time for some reason is invalid.
      Since:
      1.0

    • isClientAndDoctorHaveNeitherSentNorActiveVisit

      private boolean isClientAndDoctorHaveNeitherSentNorActiveVisit​(ClientData clientData, DoctorData doctorData)
      Checks that between client and doctor isn't present a visit with SENT or ACTIVE visit status. Used to permit creation of only one SENT or ACTIVE visit between client user and doctor user.
      Parameters:
      clientData - doctor with the same visit
      doctorData - client with the same visit
      Returns:
      bool about absence of both SENT and ACTIVE visits between the client and the doctor (true - those visits are absent).
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      VisitStatus, Visit
